name: Classic Beef Burgers
description: Level up your burger game with our foolproof recipe for the juiciest, most irresistible burger ever. Our secret? Flavourful seasonings, including a kick of mustard, and the innovative 3-in-1 Burger Press for perfectly sized, evenly cooked patties. Get ready for burger perfection!

ingredients.name: Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning
Honey Mustard or Sweet & Spicy Mustard

preparation: Preheat grill to medium-high. Brush with oil to prevent sticking.
In large bowl, combine beef with seasoning, dip mix, mustard, and egg, if using. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form mixture into 6 patties.
Grill patties, with lid closed, 4â€“5 min per side, or until cooked through.
Tuck patties into buns and add toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
